fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reprogram the whispers of a player tonight. During the next day, all whispers that they're sent will be sent to you instead. The whisperers won't be notified of this.
- Intimidate a player with actually proper grammar. They're redirect to themselves tonight, though they won't be informed. If used in conjunction with Lunari's grammarlessness ability, the target is dealt a Powerful attack.
- Scumread a player, finding their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You're have a great work ethic and can multitask very efficiently.
- You're roleblock immune, as well as immune to other things that would slow down or stop you from using your abilities.
- If this role spawns, all roles must use the exact rolecard the bot provides instead of the ones from the roles channel. This will mean any potential errors the bot has become canon.
